q_en: For Michael's SweaterAndShorts order, which other products have not been manufactured yet? Please list the types, attributes and quantities of unfinished products.

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Michael';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Michael"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE order_name = 'Michael_SweaterAndShorts' AND user_id = '6';
steps.description: Retrieve the order ID for the order with the name "Michael_SweaterAndShorts" and customer ID from Step1

steps.sql: SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id = '6';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for the order products associated with the order ID from Step2

steps.sql: SELECT op.product_id, SUM(st.completed_number) AS completed_quantity FROM order_product op JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE op.order_id = '6' GROUP BY op.product_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the completed quantities for each product in the order by joining with sewing tasks

steps.sql: SELECT op.product_id, op.number - IFNULL(st.completed_quantity, 0) AS unfinished_quantity FROM (SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id = '6') op LEFT JOIN (SELECT op.product_id, SUM(st.completed_number) AS completed_quantity FROM order_product op JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE op.order_id = '6' GROUP BY op.product_id) st ON op.product_id = st.product_id WHERE op.number > IFNULL(st.completed_quantity, 0);
steps.description: Identify products that have not been fully manufactured by comparing the ordered quantity with the completed quantity

steps.sql: SELECT pt.description AS product_type, p.attributes, up.unfinished_quantity FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id JOIN (SELECT op.product_id, op.number - IFNULL(st.completed_quantity, 0) AS unfinished_quantity FROM (SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id = '6') op LEFT JOIN (SELECT op.product_id, SUM(st.completed_number) AS completed_quantity FROM order_product op JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE op.order_id = '6' GROUP BY op.product_id) st ON op.product_id = st.product_id WHERE op.number > IFNULL(st.completed_quantity, 0)) up ON p.id = up.product_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the types and attributes of the unfinished products from Step5

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the unfinished products for the order "Michael_SweaterAndShorts" placed by Michael. Here are the details of the products that are still in the making:

| Product Type | Attributes       | Unfinished Quantity |
|--------------|------------------|---------------------|
| Sweater      | Blue, S size     | 55                  |
| Shorts       | Silver, S size   | 30                  |

It looks like there are some sweaters and shorts that still need to be completed. Hang tight, and they'll be ready soon! ðŸ˜„
